name: Multimodal Deception Detection
description: We explore a new generation of computational tools for joint modeling of physiological and linguistic signals of human behavior. Our research work includes the construction of multimodal resources for the deception detection task, including novel physio-linguistic datasets as well as the development of multimodal approaches that integrate physiological features (e.g., heart rate, respiration rate, galvanic skin response, skin temperature), and linguistic features.
